name: Amunets Dynamic Shadows - v1.0.3
description:
[h1]Amunets Dynamic Shadows[/h1]
This mod enables dynamic shadows...

Set Shadow Quality to Ultra, then quit Conan Exiles.
Open [code]\Conan Exiles\ConanSandbox\Saved\Config\WindowsNoEditor\Scalability.ini[/code] and add...

[hr]
[code]
[ShadowQuality@3]
r.Shadow.CachedShadowsCastFromMovablePrimitives=1
[/code]

Then start Conan Exiles again, and enjoy your shadows - just don't change the shadow quality ingame as this causes shadows to go crazy.

Looks nice, but is pretty hefty performance wise. (at least on my GTX 960)
author: LilMissHentai
